Introduction to ``djangotailoring``
===================================

``djangotailoring`` is a package of django applications that wrap the
functionality of the ``tailoring2`` library.

Requirements
------------

To use ``djangotailoring``, you need the following packages available on the
path:

 - `Django <http://www.djangoproject.org>`_ >= 1.3
 - `tailoring2 <https://yertle.chcr.med.umich.edu/svn/NextGenTailoring/engine/trunk/tailoring2/>`_
 - `surveytracking <https://yertle.chcr.med.umich.edu/svn/NextGenTailoring/engine/trunk/surveytracking>`_
